name: Plankton (LD31)
description:
PLANKTON

Game made for the Ludum Dare 31 game jam
solo competition, made within 48 hours

Controls :
-click to pour some food
-click to sperate the "dividing" cells from each other
>> you can get some information/help by hovering upon the "?" sign on the top-left corner of the screen

Warning : this version of the game presents a few bugs, don't hesitate to reload the page with spacebar if it happens

>> Ludum Dare entry
>> Development journal on the Ludum Dare website

you can find me on twitter / tumblr

Tools used :
- Construct2 for development
- Audacity, Bosca Ceoil and Bfxr for sounds
- some Construct2 plugins from Rex
- Graphics have been created from scratch in photoshop
- You can find the source right here
